name: Men's Untracked Pants
snippet: Updated this season with a refined silhouette, new design lines and a slick lining between the snow gaiter and hem, the Untracked Pants are warm, low-bulk snow pants built for comfort and protection.

name: MEN'S POWDER BOWL PANTS
snippet: Built for season-long comfort, the Men’s Powder Bowl Pants are built with a tough 2-layer GORE-TEX® fabric for durably waterproof/breathable and windproof protection, and articulated patterning for freedom of movement.

name: MEN'S INSULATED POWDER BOWL PANTS
snippet: These pants are built with strategically placed 60-g Thermogreen® for warmth where you need it most, and 2-layer GORE-TEX® polyester fabric for durably waterproof/breathable and windproof protection.

name: MEN'S SNOWSHOT PANTS
snippet: Fully featured and focused on utility, these H2No® Performance Standard 2-layer shell pants have an articulated fit for freedom of movement and a smooth mesh liner for comfort and ease of layering.

name: MEN'S DOWN SWEATER JACKET
snippet: The perfect warmth for just about everything, our classic Down Sweater is lightweight and windproof with a 100% recycled polyester ripstop shell and 800-fill-power Traceable Down (European goose down traced from parent farm to apparel factory to help ensure the birds that supply it are not force-fed or live-plucked).

name: MEN'S NANO-AIR® JACKET
snippet: An insulation breakthrough: The Nano-Air® Jacket featuring FullRange insulation is warm, stretchy and so breathable, you can wear it for the entirety of any highly aerobic start-stop mission in the mountains.

name: MEN'S DOWN SHIRT
snippet: The perfect warmth for just about everything, our classic Down Sweater is lightweight and windproof with a 100% recycled polyester ripstop shell and 800-fill-power Traceable Down (European goose down traced from parent farm to apparel factory to help ensure the birds that supply it are not force-fed or live-plucked).

name: MEN'S ULTRALIGHT DOWN HOODY
snippet: So light. So warm. The Ultralight Down Hoody combines 800-fill-power Traceable Down (European goose down traced from parent farm to apparel factory to help ensure the birds that supply it are not force-fed or live-plucked) with a superlight 15-denier Pertex® Quantum shell for the lightest-weight down hoody we make. Fabric is bluesign® approved.

name: MEN'S FITZ ROY TROUT MIDWEIGHT FULL-ZIP HOODY
snippet: Made of an organic cotton/polyester/spandex blend, this midweight full-zip hoody is screen-printed with inks that are PVC- and phthalate-free. Fair Trade Certified™ sewing.

name: MEN'S LINE LOGO MIDWEIGHT PULLOVER HOODY
snippet: Made of an organic cotton/polyester/spandex blend, this midweight pullover hoody is screen-printed with inks that are PVC- and phthalate-free. Fair Trade Certified™ sewing.

name: MEN'S FITZ ROY BAR MIDWEIGHT CREW SWEATSHIRT
snippet: Made of an organic cotton/polyester/spandex blend, this midweight pullover hoody is screen-printed with inks that are PVC- and phthalate-free. Fair Trade Certified™ sewing.

name: MEN'S TREE MAN MIDWEIGHT PULLOVER HOODED SWEATSHIRT
snippet: Made of an organic cotton/polyester/spandex blend, this midweight pullover hoody is screen-printed with inks that are PVC- and phthalate-free. Fair Trade Certified™ sewing.

name: MEN'S ALL SEASON FIELD SHIRT
snippet: A rugged, versatile shirt designed for any outdoor activity.

name: MEN'S POLO - TROUT FITZ ROY
snippet: A super comfortable 100% organic cotton jersey polo for the field or office.

name: MEN'S SQUEAKY CLEAN POLO
snippet: Providing T-shirt comfort with a collar, the Squeaky Clean Polo is made of soft 100% organic cotton heathered jersey for all-day comfort.

name: MEN'S BANDITO SHIRT
snippet: Made from fast-wicking recycled polyester fabric with 25-UPF sun protection, Polygiene® permanent odor control and a back ventilation system, this is a western-inspired shirt that’s built for action. Fabric is bluesign® approved.
